function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Chemical exposure and health risks from chlorine dioxide","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of chlorine in wastewater treatment system","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper handling of chlorine disinfection equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of chlorine levels in wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to untreated hospital wastes and wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of systematic studies on disinfection of hospital wastes and wastewaters during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of wastewater treatment and general waste disposal measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of infectious hospital wastes and wastewater could cause serious risks to public health and the environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission routes of sars-cov-2 include droplet, contact, and possibly airborne transmission in specific circumstances and settings.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of misinformation or incorrect data through the kg","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate representation of covid-19 topics in the kg","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited engagement and utilization of openkg-covid19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Openkg-covid19 not being updated daily","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Small number of samples for property evaluation in openkg-covid19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Propagation of contagious diseases through knowledge sharing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation leading to incorrect treatment and drug development","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prediction of unknown side effects leading to unforeseen health risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Manually evaluated data quality and interlinking may lead to errors in the openkg-covid19 data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Volunteers committing data corrections may introduce incorrect information into the kg.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of blockchain technology for provenance tracking and credit incentive may pose security and privacy risks.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential risk of transmitting covid-19 through shared browsing interfaces or search interfaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of misinformation or outdated information related to covid-19 in the knowledge graphs and search results.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of overburdening the sparql endpoint and graph database, leading to performance issues and slow response times.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High false match rate in schema matching due to similarity measure","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inconsistent naming convention may lead to confusion and misinterpretation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low-quality literal information in kgs may affect entity alignment performance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High error rate in kgs, with mistakes in entity and relation matching","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited schema overlaps and entity matches between kgs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Duplicated entities in the encyclopedia kg","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of process","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Generalization of results to the entire data set without sufficient confidence","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of domain knowledge in workers from crowdsourcing platforms for managing medical information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate or incomplete medical data in the kgs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sampling and labeling process might not represent the entire dataset","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for inaccurate similarity computation leading to incorrect matches or nonmatches","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unresolved entity pairs leading to incomplete data integration","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of validation for human labeling","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of central schema for covid-19 knowledge graphs","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Naming issues in schemata leading to interference with matching process","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of crowdsourced entity resolution approach for finding entity matches","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of advanced methods in knowledge extraction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on distant supervision for labeling process","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extraction of incorrect triples from medical genetic information.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
